sentence.text: Besides, previous evidence suggested that morphogenesis of a polarized epithelium expression was changed in schizophrenia patients.
Furthermore, association signal between morphogenesis of a polarized epithelium variants and schizophrenia has been reported in several European samples.

In the present study, we first analyzed two expression quantitative trait loci (eQTL) datasets in healthy individuals and investigated the associations of eQTL of morphogenesis of a polarized epithelium with schizophrenia in independent European samples.
These results suggested that morphogenesis of a polarized epithelium is likely a risk gene for schizophrenia, at least in European populations.
